Key Match Events: Indiana scored the first three shots of the game
Jaylen Brown scored five straight points to cut the lead to four
Payton Pritchard drilled a three to give Boston its first lead of the game
Back-to-back threes from Haliburton and Jarace Walker gave Indy a six-point lead midway through the second quarter
Pritchard then scored eight points in a row
Jayson Tatum blocked Myles Turner at the rim which led to a Derrick White layup
Miscellaneous Highlights: Jordan Walsh joined Payton Pritchard as the first two guys off the bench
Pritchard moved ahead of Avery Bradley for ninth place in all time three-pointers made in Celtics history
Others: Indiana win the season series against Boston
The Pacers scored 66 points in the paint
Boston struggled early to contain Indy’s perimeter players
Boston, without Jrue Holiday, struggled in the first half to contain Andrew Nembhard
The Celtics continued to struggle to keep Indy out of the paint
The Pacers continued to get into the paint, and with Porzingis out there was no rim protecting big for Boston
The Celtics will look to bounce back on New Year’s Eve when they take on the Toronto Raptors at 3 p.m.
